quotes: Vint Cerf served as chairman of the board of the Internet Corporation for Assigned Names and Numbers (ICANN) from 2000-2007
and has been a Visiting Scientist at the Jet Propulsion Laboratory since 1998
Cerf served as founding president of the Internet Society (ISOC) from 1992-1995
In December 1994, People magazine identified Cerf as one of that year’s 25 Most Intriguing People
President Obama appointed him to the National Science Board in 2012
